page.title: 06EDUCATION IN CANFORD MAGNA.
page.content: {BROADSTONE MIDDLE SCHOOL}is situated in Dunyeats Rd.on the N.E.edge of Broadstone.It has 34 staff inc. the Headmaster.There are 744 boys and girls aged 9-13 yrs.The feeder schools are Broadstone 1st,Springdale 1st. and Merley lst.Canteen meals are cooked at lunchtime by 6 cooks.Pupils are super- vised during lunch-hour by 5 dinner- ladies.The school is cleaned by 1 care taker & 6 cleaners.5 ancillary workers help in the daily running of the school.A mini-bus is available to take children on trips.In addition to the basic 3R's the pupils learn Drama,Art, French,Geography,History,Craft,Science Music,Religeon,Games,P.E. & swimming. In the upper years they learn needle- work,home economics and computer studies.The pupils progress to Corfe Hills Upper School,or if selected go to Poole or Parkstone Grammar Schools.
